mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NAME BOARDNAME, BOARD_ID BOARDID, BOARD_AUTHORITY BOARDAUTHORITY, IS_TEAM ISTEAM FROM BOARD

SELECT CONTENTTITLE,EMPLOYEENAME,WRITEDATE, NO, CONTENTID FROM ( SELECT CONTENT_TITLE CONTENTTITLE, CONTENT_ID CONTENTID, (SELECT EMPLOYEE_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMPLOYEE_NO = CONTENT.EMPLOYEE_NO ) EMPLOYEENAME, TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') WRITEDATE , ROWNUM NO FROM CONTENT WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId} ) ORDER BY NO DESC

SELECT CONTENTTITLE,EMPLOYEENAME,WRITEDATE, NO, CONTENTID FROM ( SELECT CONTENT_TITLE CONTENTTITLE, CONTENT_ID CONTENTID, (SELECT EMPLOYEE_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMPLOYEE_NO = CONTENT.EMPLOYEE_NO ) EMPLOYEENAME, TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') WRITEDATE , ROWNUM NO FROM CONTENT WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId} AND TEAM_ID= #{teamId} ) ORDER BY NO DESC
